name: Smartwool Hike Light Margarita Crew Socks - Women's
description: Light cushion and fun colours to keep you going on the trails. The flat-knit toe seam keeps your toes comfortable and the arch brace prevents bunching.Made of soft merino wool, nylon and elastane.Arch brace holds sock securely in place.Flat-knit toe seam doesn't cause hotspots or chafing.Narrower profile is designed to fit women's narrower feet.
